post.body: Green Tea for you sir.Happy New Year!
YouTube: http://tinyurl.com/7mop7b
How many 'buxom statue collectors" can their actually be? And where do they get ther money from?
The sun is sinking into the ocean. G'night sun.
Lovely New Years Day Brunch. Many delicious lucky foods were eaten.
These Hunter Thompson Motivational Posters are awesome: http://snurl.com/9casz "When the going get wierd, the wierd turn pro."
Happy New Years to everyone! Let's get it awwwwwn!
My favorite Video Game of the last year? Fallout 3, hands down. Thanks for asking!
Watching old eps of "In Search Of" for a pitch. MAN, that show had the best soundtrack. And Leonard Nimoy. How can you go wrong?
My inbox is a stone cold mess.
Last day of 2008! So if you're going to do anything this year, do it now.
I used to think that New Year's is arbitrary, and it is. But if we didn't have it, we'd have to invent it.
Spicel is like spices, but with an L at the end instead of an S.
BBC's Casanova series never came out in the States? Something has gone terribly wrong.
Left my Gunpowder Green Tea Leaves wet overnight. They became Gunpowder Red. Tastes pretty damn good too.
The Departed was good enough, but not great. Gangs of New York at least had some crazy on top.
Thinking about Social Media. I can usually separate the hype from the potential, but here I may need some help.
It's boxing day! Now where are my gloves...
Giant Steampunk Cyber-Mecha make me very happy.
Merry Christmas everyone. I hope you all get everything you want!
